relevant_communication:
The team draft and share regular policy briefings and advise on EU-related policy developments.  
 
Support the organisation of seminars and events involving business representatives, stakeholders groups and policy makers.

goals__remit:
MSL is a strategic communications and engagement network, advisor in all aspects of communication strategy: from PR to financial communications, from public affairs to reputation management, and from crisis communication to event management.  
 
The Brussels office of MSL specialises in EU policy and regulatory analysis, communication strategy, PR and media relations, stakeholders communication and outreach.
